subtitles.text: I'm finally at the stage where I've arrived.

Sasaki will be on the dais.
The first question is "What was your impression when you first saw the show?
First of all, Miri's answer was very blunt.
Yes, it was during the screening that I saw Miri.
It says that she was shocked to see someone wearing a blunt piece of paper at the audition.
I may have changed the rules of auditioning.
It turned out all right, didn't it?
Then Meinya, who I met for the first time at the audition... how old is she?
She looked so young. I felt overwhelmingly younger than her, and I was worried.
I'm not an old lady, but you're not an old lady, Meinya.
Next was Haruren, a very shy girl.
She's really quiet and shy, like an elementary school student.
She was quiet too, wasn't she?

I'm not talking about the quiet one, I'm talking about Harren.

During the audition, you were told not to get involved with the other kids.
He said it would be awkward if you were close to them if you didn't get accepted.
I see. Who told you that?
It was an idol friend of mine.
Next, we took a survey asking you to describe yourself in one word.
Twintails are the strongest idol, Miku Fujisaki, who will save the world.
I'm a girl who dreams big and works hard with all her might.
When I see someone like Miku who has ambitions and works hard, I feel like I have to work hard too.

I'm a senior in high school.

First of all, I'd like to introduce Monami.
The week of Ryoka's and my birthday, she drew a portrait of us on her insta-story.
You noticed? It was just a picture I drew in a few seconds, so I didn't think anyone would notice.

That was the day we all remembered each other,

And I was like, "I'm leaving Miri behind.
Running? And Miri was so tongue-tied.
It was the very beginning, wasn't it?
Yes, it was the very beginning.

I am a person who can no longer speak, so even if my Japanese is not good, I am able to remember and convey my feelings honestly.
I am told that my Japanese is not good.

I'm amazed at how stoically she tackles everything with all her might.
I've seen her practice a single dance move over and over again until she was satisfied with it.
Then let's keep going like this.
The careful attention you give to each and every job.
Even when filming for TikTok, you take more time than anyone else to redo it until you find your best. I think that's great and amazing.
